articles.title: Evacuations under way in Mariupol; Pelosi visits Ukraine - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: A long-awaited evacuation of civilians from a besieged steel plant in the Ukrainian city of Mariupol began Sunday, as U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi revealed that she visited Ukraine's president to show unflinching American support for the country's defense …

articles.title: Rare Black Moon solar eclipse takes bite out of sun over South America - Space.com
articles.description: The partial solar eclipse was the first of 2022.
articles.content:
Skywatchers across parts of the Southern Hemisphere were treated to the first partial eclipse of the year today.

articles.title: The first solar eclipse of 2022 has begun and here's the view! - Space.com
articles.description: Live broadcasts bring the eclipse from South America worldwide.
articles.content:
It's the moment skywatchers have been waiting for: The year's first solar eclipse has begun.
